# isBoundToSystemGesture

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the user binds the element to a system gesture.

## Declaration

```swift
var isBoundToSystemGesture: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the user binds this element to a gesture; otherwise, it’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Handling system gesture input

- **preferredSystemGestureState**: The preferred state for handling input when the user binds the element to a system gesture.
- **GCControllerElement.SystemGestureState**: A state for handling input when an element is part of a system gesture.
